proposals.description: Add collaborative proposal evaluation system. Currently proposals go directly to implementation without peer review. Implement a multi-agent evaluation phase where Tester and Refiner can assess proposals before Writer begins implementation, reducing failed implementations.
proposals.implementation_sketch: Extend workflow to include evaluation_phase after proposal generation. Tester estimates implementation risk, Refiner assesses technical feasibility, Dharmic Gate scores alignment. Only proposals passing threshold proceed to implementation. Add proposal revision capability based on feedback.
